author: samisa
msg: Fixed problems in loading messages and policies form services.xml

author: damitha
msg: Before storing the application message context set the operation context's
is_in_use attribute to true. After the message is acked set this to false.
Otherwise when thread mutext of the operation context is destroyed server crashes

author: damitha
msg: Added is_in_use attribute to the op_ctx.
This is necessary when destroying the thread mutex at the http_worker to
check whether the operation context is still in use

author: pyang
msg: Apply patch for HARMONY-3757([classlib][beans]java.beans.beancontext.BeanContextServicesSupport has problem in self-deserialization)

author: andreas
msg: Removing clipboard from session after pasting. See bug 34988.
